com.io7m.r1.kernel.types

Interface KInstanceType

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    KInstanceOpaqueType, KInstanceRegularType, KInstanceTranslucentLitType, KInstanceTranslucentType, KInstanceTranslucentUnlitType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KInstanceOpaqueRegular, KInstanceTranslucentRefractive, KInstanceTranslucentRegular, KInstanceTranslucentSpecularOnly

    public interface KInstanceType
    The type of instances with instance-specific transformations ( KTransformType).

        Accept a visitor.
        Type Parameters:
        A - The type of values returned by the visitor
        E - The type of exceptions raised by the visitor
        V - The type of the visitor

        Throws:
